name: Beached (itch)
description:
These sea creatures are sad and want to reunite with their friends, but they can only move together in pairs.

Instructions: Move with WASD/Arrow Keys,  Wait with Space, Reset the puzzle with R, and change active creatures with left and right mouse buttons. The goal is to unite all the creatures together.

This is a Team Submission for GMTK Jam 2021

Design: OrangeScientist1 (https://orangescientist1.itch.io/), Kevin Diaz (https://kevdiaz0107.itch.io/)

Art: Armando (https://armm1998.itch.io/)

Music: Michael Hoffmann (https://sahasrala86.itch.io/)

Code: Justin Snyder (me)
